root.name: Senran Kagura Shinovi Versus: Shōjo-tachi no Shōmei
root.description: OverviewSenran Kagura: Shinovi Versus is spin-off from the 3DS Senran Kagura series made for the PlayStation Vita, exchanging the side-scrolling brawler style of the previous games for Dynasty Warriors inspired hack 'n slash gameplay on full 3D battlefields. It will feature 2 new factions, 20 playable characters, and 4 player competitive multiplayer over WiFi.The title, Shinovi, is a play on shinobi, the traditional Japanese name for the ninja, with the b replaced by a v for the Vita.
